descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jordan Poole goes unguarded down the lane for the easy one-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Poole crams home transition dunk) 2021/05/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Poole crams home transition dunk

videos.description: Stan Van Gundy was not happy with his team after the first quarter and he made it known.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Interview (Stan Van Gundy’s positives from the first quarter: ‘Absolutely none’) 2021/05/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Stan Van Gundy's positives from the first quarter: 'Absolutely none'

videos.description: Nico Mannion lobs it up to Mychal Mulder who hangs on the rim and forces a timeout from the Pelicans.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Mulder’s alley-oop dunk forces a Pelicans' timeout) 2021/05/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Mulder's alley-oop dunk forces a Pelicans' timeout

videos.description: Nico Mannion throws the pretty behind-the-back pass to a running Mychal Mulder for the layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Mannion goes behind the back to Mulder for the deuce) 2021/05/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Mannion goes behind the back to Mulder for the deuce

videos.description: Jaxson Hayes gets way up above the rim and finishes the dunk plus the foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hayes finishes impressive and-1 dunk) 2021/05/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hayes finishes impressive and-1 dunk

videos.description: Jordan Bell goes up for the dunk and gets rim stuffed causing Steph Curry to do the surrender cobra on the bench.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Steph in disbelief after Bell gets rim stuffed on dunk attempt) 2021/05/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Steph in disbelief after Bell gets rim stuffed on dunk attempt

videos.description: Kent Bazemore gets a huge save and falls out of bounds. He's celebrated by the whole Warriors' bench including Steph Curry.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Steph and Warriors' bench hype Bazemore up after game-winning save) 2021/05/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Steph and Warriors' bench hype Bazemore up after game-winning save
